notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, N.A. and E.O.S.M.; Methodology, A.K. and E.O.S.M.; Statistical analysis, A.F.-K.; Managed patient recruitment and sample collection, N.A.; Laboratory analysis, N.A. and A.K.; Resources, A.K. and M.H.; Writing—Original Draft Preparation, N.A.; Writing—Review & Editing, A.K., E.O.S.M., A.F.-K. and M.H; Supervision, E.O.S.M.; Project Administration E.O.S.M; Funding Acquisition, E.O.S.M.; All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
